item.title: Mode Control Panel Selectors – Vert Speed Selector (DN & UP)

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided FLCH mode is operative.

numlitem.para: Normal AFDS operating procedures do not require V/S selection
Use LNAV and VNAV as desired.
Vertical Speed Mode may still be used to hold aircraft vertical speed at time of engagement.

placard.para: Placard Vertical Speed Selector "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
